resource.chars: Framed in a Saracenic arch. The arch is divided into 17 compartments in each of which is an oval gem with a roughly circular eye. The shafts are each divided into six compartments: each contains a rough pattern of leaves. Two sprays project from the top of each shaft. The lettering on this page (and those which follow) is in capitals, drawn in outline with the pen and having the thick strokes coloured with yellow or green
